Name: Nya Hokksund
Details:
The "Nya Hokksund" is a extensively modified Invader-class JumpShip that was originally a DCMS vessel seized by KungsArm√© during the Ronin War and subsequently assigned to MIMIR.

While it still maintains the ability to transport three DropShips, enhancements have been made to its communication and surveillance capabilities. However, the original limited anti-ship capacity of the Invader-class JumpShip has not been improved upon.
